DataElement.preferredName: Blood Coagulation Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/no indicator pertaining to information related to assessment of clot formation in blood.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment of clot formation in blood.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Blood circulating throughout the body.:The process of clot formation. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
The process of clot formation. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prothrombin Time (PT) <=1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is therapeutically anticoagulated in which case the INR must be within appropriate anticoagulation limits for the clinical indication

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prothrombin (PT) <= 1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is receiving anticoagulant therapy in which case the PT must be within the therapeutic range of intended use for the anticoagulant

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prothrombin Time (PT) <=1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is therapeutically anticoagulated in which case PT must be within appropriate anticoagulation limits for the clinical indication

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prothrombin Time (PT) <=1.5 x institutional ULN unless patient is receiving anticoagulant therapy, in which case the INR or PT must be within the therapeutic range of intended use for the anticoagulant

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is this patient's Prothrombin Time (PT) less than or equal to 1.5 x institutional ULN?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving anticoagulant therapy and PT or PTT within therapeutic range of intended use of anticoagulants?

DataElement.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/20/2022: fixed the box symbol in AQT.wz
